html: (2 Nephi 7:1)."For your transgressions is your mother put away." In speaking to latter-day Israel, who is to be redeemed, reference is made to her "mother" who was "put away" (separated) because of her "transgressions." Some have suggested this implies ancient Israel (the mother) was divorced (put away) but that the bill of divorcement does not apply to modern Israel. However, it appears that ancient "mother Israel" left her Husband (put herself away).
